keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: America should identify those responsible for the egregious blunder and do more to compensate the victims’ families.

headline.print_headline: A Moral Debt for Bombing a Hospital
headline.main: A Moral Debt for Bombing the Doctors Without Borders Hospital

snippet: America should identify those responsible for the egregious blunder and do more to compensate the victims’ families.
abstract: Editorial criticizes military officials for refusing to identify individuals responsible for October 2015 bombing of Doctors Without Borders hospital in Kunduz, Afghanistan, or provide assurance they will be adequately punished; notes arguments that fatal mistakes resulting from recklessness can constitute crimes; holds American government must do more to compensate families of dead and wounded.
